name: blueberry-theme
description: Introducing Blueberry, a VS Code color theme that brings a refreshing touch to your coding environment. Immerse yourself in the calming depths of a rich, deep blue, reminiscent of ripe blueberries. The carefully curated syntax highlighting ensures an optimal balance between readability and aesthetics, making your code not only functional but also a pleasure to look at. Whether you're debugging, coding, or exploring, let Blueberry be your visual companion, creating a seamless and enjoyable coding experience.
